miniapp.name: CastMyVibe
miniapp.subtitle: Daily crypto vibes
miniapp.description: Get your personalized daily crypto vibe with humor, optimism, or reality. Roll up to 5 times, cast your favorite vibes, and share the fun!
miniapp.tagline: Your daily dose of crypto vibes
miniapp.ogDescription: Get your personalized daily crypto vibe with humor, optimism, or reality!
